synopsis.p: Removes salt and pepper noise from a fitacf file.

description.p: Removes salt and pepper noise from a fitacf file by applying a 3x3 median filter in range-time space. The quality flag in the center cell of a 3x3 range-time grid is set to zero if the median of the quality flags in the 3x3 grid is zero. Filtering is performed separately for each beam and channel.

example.description: Perform the speck removal procedure on the fitacf-format file named "20170825.gbr.fitacf". The output file is called "20170825.gbr.filtered.fitacf".
